filters

Class SubsampleFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • filters.SubsampleFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilterInterface

    public class SubsampleFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements FilterInterface
    This filter takes a random subsample of the data.

      • filterAndCopy

        public DataSet[] filterAndCopy(DataSet[] dsets)
        Takes a random subsample from each dataset. The remaining discarded data is appended in form of DataSets. It is meant for splitting data into training and test sets.
        Parameters:
        dsets - An array of DataSet objects to filter and copy.
        Returns:
        An array of datasets, where the first half is the selected subsamples and the second half is the rejected subsamples.
